pullrequest.title: Compile and run fixes for OSX

content.raw: Actually you can `brew install qt` and also `brew tap ros/groovy && brew install tinyxml`, so that just leaves libcurl and libtar. OSX comes with curl, but it doesn't have a pkg-config file, so cmake can't find it. You can also `brew install curl` and then set `PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/local/Cellar/curl/7.29.0/lib/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH`, but it would be nicer if cmake could find the system-installed version of libcurl.
